alert.note: Alert for Charles City; Hanover; King William; New Kent (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 17 at 5:28PM EDT until October 17 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL CHARLES CITY...NORTHWESTERN NEW KENT...SOUTHEASTERN HANOVER AND SOUTHWESTERN KING WILLIAM COUNTIES... At 528 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Manquin to near Tunstall to Bottoms Bridge, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. These severe storms will be near... Talleysville around 540 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Wrights Corner, Quinton, Browns Corner, Palls, Mountcastle, Orapax Farms, New Kent Airport and Westwood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A tornado watch remains in effect for the warned area. Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. Although a tornado is not immediately likely, if one is spotted act quickly and move to a place of safety inside a sturdy structure, such as a basement or small interior room. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Charles City; Hanover; King William; New Kent
